
.data 1024
0000010000000000 //1024
0000000000001010 //10

.text 0
0001000111000101 //mov reg5 reg7
0001110101000011 
0000010000000000 //mov reg3 1024
0110000011000101 //add reg5 reg3
0001110101000011 
0000000000000010 //mov reg3 10
0000101010000000 //inc reg0
0001000000000001 //mov reg1 reg0

0000101011000011 //dec reg3
cycle:
0001000000000010 //mov reg2 reg0
0110000001000010 //add reg2 reg1
0001000001000000 //mov reg0 reg1
0001000010000001 //mov reg1 reg2
0000101011000011 //dec reg3
0000001011111011 //bne cycle
